activities: online information submitted by individuals concerning our company or our products.

recoursemech: BioZone has selected to use the EU Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) to investigate unresolved complaints. BioZone agrees to cooperate and comply with the EU DPAs and the Swiss FDPIC to investigate all unresolved complaints.
